dkeep.logic

Class OgreLevel

  • java.lang.Object
    • dkeep.logic.Level
      • dkeep.logic.OgreLevel

  • public class OgreLevel
extends Level
    This class is a Level whose enemies are ogres.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      OgreLevel(int OgreNr)
      Constructs a default OgreLevel that will be used for the game's second and last level.
      OgreLevel(int OgreNr, int ogreX, int ogreY, int width, int height)
      Constructs an OgreLevel that will be used for the game's level editor functionality.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class dkeep.logic.Level

        drawEnemies, drawHero, drawKey, drawWeapons, getEndLevelX, getEndLevelY, getEnemies, getHero, getKeyX, getKeyY, getOgreLevelCopy, getTableCopy, getWorktable, isKeyEnabled, npc, openAllDoors, openDoors, setEndLevelX, setEndLevelY, setKeyEnabled, setKeyX, setKeyY, setTable, setTableChar, updateWorkTable

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • OgreLevel

        public OgreLevel(int OgreNr)
        Constructs a default OgreLevel that will be used for the game's second and last level. The OgreNr parameter will indicate the number of ogres in the level.
        Parameters:
        OgreNr -

      • OgreLevel

        public OgreLevel(int OgreNr,
                 int ogreX,
                 int ogreY,
                 int width,
                 int height)
        Constructs an OgreLevel that will be used for the game's level editor functionality. The table's dimensions will be set using the parameters width and height. The OgreNr parameter will indicate the amount of ogres and their initial position will be set using ogreX and ogreY.
        Parameters:
        OgreNr -
        ogreX -
        ogreY -
        width -
        height -
